description:
Osborn, the sorcerer from the Dark Rebel Armies, succumbs to the now-resurrected Dark Schneider and his spell Venom. Sensing that the legendary wizard has returned, the Four Divine Kings send Kevidubu for another attack on the Kingdom of Meta-llicana, but at the kingdom, the arrogant and rebellious Dark Schneider does anything but listen to the priests.
Source: Official Website
